name: Tanisia Harris
text: Studio 53 is the ideal venue to host your event! It has great space, and easily transformed into anything you can envision. I’ve been to 3 events at this location and each time has been beautiful and a great vibe. The owner, Tiffany, is extremely professional and helpful. Can’t wait to book my future events!

resp.text:
Thank you so much, Tanisia! I really appreciate you so much for the awesome review. Whenever you need us, we will be ready to host your event.
Thank you again!

name: Yolanda Denson
text: July 11th 2021 was the first time my family and friends attended Studio53 and it was beyond what we expected. The space was great the staff was right there to answer questions. The bathrooms are nicely decorated with a beautiful sitting room. My mom turned 70 so everything had to be perfect and Studio53 help make that happen! Check out the pics I posted ♥️

resp.text: Thank you so much! You are awesome. Can’t wait to have you back again.

name: mica naylor
text: I’m new here to Huntsville & I had the pleasure of being a vendor at a pop up shop here in May. I absolutely loved the environment! Ms. Tiffany was so sweet & helpful! I was prepared to get my makeup done in my car for the event but Ms. Tiffany set up a space for my makeup artist & I in the back. I was and still am so grateful. Did I mention the space in the venue? It’s PERFECT for literally any event. I will definitely be going back! I recommend this place to everyone who is looking for a venue 💞 keep going Ms. Tiffany! I am SO proud of you! May your light continue to shine bright & your business continue to flourish! 💞

resp.text:
Mica! Thank you for your awesome review of Studio 53. I’m so glad that you enjoyed yourself and we are looking forward to working with you very soon.
Your business is awesome! Once again, thank you!

name: Bianca McCall
text: I'm new to Huntsville I was looking for a venue to host my very 1st event. I must say Studio53 was very spacious and clean, and Ms.Tiffany the owner was very professional with a great work ethic awesome customer service. Looking to host an event venue Studio53 is great.

resp.text: You are something special! Thank you so much. I really appreciate you for having your events at the facility. You’ve been an awesome client. Thank you again!

name: Angela Mastin
text: This place is amazing.... Great for gatherings... Anything you want to celebrate... Parties... Baby showers... Birthday and or anniversary... This place is a great space... The 360.selfie stick what and yes....

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ms. Mastin! We appreciate you!

name: Shawanda Chisholm
text: I went to Studio 53 for an event my friend hosted; it was extremely nice and clean in there; the owner was very people friendly and courteous, I would definitely recommend if you’re looking for a place to host your event!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Shawanda we appreciate your positive feedback and are looking forward to seeing your smiling face again soon!

name: SOLO Open Opinions
text: Nice clean and spacious venue. And a wonderful owner

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are glad that you enjoyed your time at the Studio.

name: Christian Carter
text: I absolutely love Studio53. This social venue is very well kept and the customer service is awesome. The owner Tiffany is very active and involved. I definitely recommend this venue to anyone having any kind of event.

resp.text: Thank you so much! I really appreciate your review and feedback.

name: De'Shaunna Parker
text: Venue was clean and cool. Owner was very friendly and helpful. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate your feedback.

name: Ashley lawhorn
text: Such a nice venue! Clean environment, great space and the owner is so friendly and inviting! If you are looking for a venue, choose Studio 53, you will not be disappointed 👍🏾

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ashley!! We look forward to doing more business with you soon. Please check out Kuhrizmuh LLC

name: Candice Hayes
text: Tiffany is a very pleasant person! I had the pleasure of being one of the vendors, with a recent pop up shop, over the weekend. Her staff is absolutely amazing, and the atmosphere was awesome ! Thank you Tiffany for a wonderful experience !

resp.text: Hey Candice! It was a complete honor and my pleasure to meet you! I’m glad that you enjoyed yourself and I can’t wait to business with you again. Looking forward to next time.

name: Alexcia Sterling
text:
Studio 53 is more than just a location; issa vibe!!
Tiffany brings a fun spirit to all her events. The building is fresh and clean. This makes it a great canvas for whatever you have in mind for your event. Use your imagination and she will make it happen!!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you for your review. We definitely appreciate you. Looking forward to seeing you again soon. ❤️

name: Michelle Stephens
text: Studio 53 is the place to be! Lots of space for almost any event you want to host plus a great place to socialize when they have public events!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!!! We appreciate you.

name: Mia Lee
text: Everything about this venue screams YES!!!! Very clean & versatile, great location, nice open space, and the list goes on. Tiffany, the owner, is very accommodating, kind, and professional. She works hard to help your vision come to life...Studio 53 is definitely the place to be!

resp.text: Thank you so much!!! I really appreciate you for your great review.

name: M Lee
text: If you looking to have a nice Gathering this would be the place to share your experiences

resp.text: Thank you so much for your awesome review! We hope that you come back.

name: Jana Goggans
text: I participated in a pop up at Studio 53 and I thoroughly enjoyed it!!  The facility was clean, everyone was helpful and the owner checked to make sure everything was good during the event!!  I definitely recommend if you need a space for an event!!

resp.text: We thank you for your participation in the pop up event! We love all of the items that you have at your business, 81 Home, Gift & Glam! We are looking forward to working with you again soon!

name: Decadent Aesthetics
text: I absolutely love Studio 53! It is spacious and clean! The manager was very easy to deal with and pricing is great also!

resp.text: We are so grateful for your review and glad that you enjoyed you’re time at our facility. Decadent Aesthetics is a beautiful brand and we are happy to be customers of your brand as well.

name: Latoya Whitfield
text: This is a really great space for a wedding reception, birthday parties or dinners, and/or a great set  up for photography sessions! The owner is very friendly and has great timeliness and customer service! I highly recommend!!!! ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

resp.text: Thank you so much Mrs. Whitfield we are looking forward to doing business again with you soon!

name: HIS FAITFUL
text: Nice place owner was very nice & friendly

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!

name: Tiffany Talks
text: The event center location is perfect from either side of town, therefore I love the convenience. The owner Tiffany, very customer friendly & professional. This event center , can be perfect for any occasion.

resp.text: Thank you, Tiffany Talks! We greatly appreciate your feed back in regards to our venue. We can’t wait to see you again!

name: Marietta Jones
text: Studio 53 is an amazing atmosphere. Everything is clean and we'll organized. Tiffany Draper has an amazing smile and awesome attitude.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your awesome review!!!

name: Andrea Ball
text: Large, clean space, very affordable, staff is very professional & timely. Rented the space for a wedding and loved it. Will definitely rent again

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We appreciate your business!

name: Summer
text: We recently held our wedding reception here and I would just like to say everything was perfect! Owners were both patient and professional. We couldn’t have chosen a better place.

resp.text: Summer, thank you for choosing Studio 53 for your reception. We appreciate you both. Congratulations on your marriage.

name: Arkesha Crutcher
text: Studio 53 is a beautiful establishment.   It is very clean, the floors are absolutely beautiful,  and the owner is a sweetheart.   I will definitely book here for any event.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again very soon!

name: jeleisa cummings
text: The event center nice, clean, and spacious. The events are always great and the owner Tiffany is the absolute best. She is always helpful and very welcoming.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate your business and are looking forward to serving you in the future.

name: Flenardo Taylor
text: Incredible venue.

resp.text: Thank you so much!!! We hope that you come back again.

name: Angel Johnson
text: Amazing place to hold any event!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Can’t wait to have you back!

name: Just Tunji
text: Spacious building which is handicap accessible.  Reasonably priced and the location is in a great spot. The owner is a gem and a pleasure to work with.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We appreciate you and look forward to serving you again!

name: Winsome Battle
text: I loved the intimate vibe of this venue! I attended the Soothe Sessionz event this past weekend, and the sounds were amazing in the space. The building has plenty of parking, the inside is newly renovated and CLEAN (I can't say enough how important this is)! They also offer tables & chairs on-site, so I will be recommending them to all of my clients who want an intimate space for wedding ceremonies and receptions. It's a blank space that designers and decorators will love!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We appreciate it!

name: fade factory
text: Very professional, clean, and spacious. Would definently recommend!!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Looking forward to your business again.

name: Vernon T. Mccants
text: Now this is a jewel of the community

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mr. McCants! I appreciate you.

name: Andrianne Adams
text: I highly recommend Studio 53 for any of your event needs. The prices are very reasonable and the owner Tiffany, is professional and knowledgeable. The space is beautiful and well kept. I highly recommend contacting Studio 53 for your next event.

resp.text: Thank you so very much for your kind review!

name: MR WARD
text: Cool i guess

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Mr. Ward. Please email us at info@studio53huntsville.com so that we can make your review of the Studio better.

name: Diana Murdock
text:
Went here for the first time to a Zumba class. Had a great time! Met some great ladies. And Tiffany, the owner is a pleasure to know.
This is in a great location, and a good spot for parties, meetings, etc...

resp.text: Diana, thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your visit at Studio 53. See you next time.

name: Tasha L.
text: Such a great experience! We needed something like this date night adventures are the best. We are going back to start an art gallery wall lol! Thanks for everything Studio 53!! See you soon!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!

name: Kausha Edwards
text: The Owner, Tiffany Draper is Amazing!! Excellent Customer Service, Awesome Space!! I'd definitely use Studio 53 for further events!

resp.text: Thank you, Kausha! We are glad that you enjoyed our space. Looking forward to doing business with you again.

name: Keema Hawkins
text: Huntsville newest gem..... Great space.... Highly recommend for your next event.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review!

name: Ty Bennu
text: Amazing facility, clean, professional and Soooo personable. I will definitely be booking again with Studio 53

resp.text: Thank you, Tim! We love working with you.

name: Angelia Humphrey
text: So proud of the new business venture. You will do great in this area.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Beverly Johnson
text: Studio 53 is a great location for an event!  Ms.Draper’s professionalism and attention to detail is exceptional.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Beverly! You are such a joy to be around and I have enjoyed working with you.

name: juanita jackson
text: We had a great time at this venue, it was so lovely.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!

name: reshonda Jackson
text: Very nice establishment. Great atmosphere!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!

name: Gavin Langley
text:
This man is literally the best guys.
He’ll help out on any need you want.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Shirley Jefferson
text: Enjoyed painting

resp.text: Thank you so much! We look forward to having you back for another event soon.

name: James Long
text: Best place in town to hold events!!!!
